justification: A’s ask (Flores) targets B’s steady RB2 despite B’s conservative, win-now mindset. Offer (injured RB3 Robinson + volatile WR4 Martinez) doesn’t match B’s floor/consistency preference or urgent needs. Minimal nod to B’s SoS focus; rationale is A-centric and generic. Trade is mechanically feasible but contextually unrealistic for B to accept. ToM reasoning is weak and lacks evidence-based justification.
